verses.name: Hebrews 12:17
verses.text: For ye know how that afterward, when he would have inherited the blessing, he was rejected: for he found no place of repentance, though he sought it carefully with tears.

verses.name: Hebrews 12:18
verses.text: For ye are not come unto the mount that might be touched, and that burned with fire, nor unto blackness, and darkness, and tempest,

verses.name: Hebrews 12:19
verses.text: And the sound of a trumpet, and the voice of words; which voice they that heard intreated that the word should not be spoken to them any more:
